fields.name: ach-login-10
fields.title: Vegeta
fields.description: Login daily, for 14 days in a row

fields.title: Morpheus
fields.description: Login between 3-5 AM for 3 days (not in a row)

fields.name: ach-early-bird
fields.title: Eos
fields.description: Login between 6-8 AM for 3 days (not in a row)

fields.name: ach-popularity
fields.title: Elvis
fields.description: Get messages from 5 different persons in 15 mins

fields.name: ach-qotd-10
fields.title: Hawkeye
fields.description: Answer qotd correctly 10 times in a row

fields.name: ach-win-fast
fields.title: Flash
fields.description: Win a challenge in less than a minute

fields.name: ach-chall-100
fields.title: Gambit
fields.description: Play a total of 100 challenges or more

fields.name: ach-this-is-sparta
fields.title: Juggernaut
fields.description: Accept all incoming challenges in the last 7 days (min 5 challenges)

fields.name: ach-god-mode-on
fields.title: Akira
fields.description: Win all challenges and answer correctly to all questions of the day 5 days in a row (min 5 challenges, all questions of the day answered)

fields.name: ach-chall-10-a-day
fields.title: Maverick
fields.description: Play a total of 10 challenges in a day
